character.name: Avery Glass
character.background: Custodian scout cataloguing resonance anomalies across the Auric Steppe Corridor for the Prismwell Kite Guild.

location.atmosphere: Glassfall mist refracts across suspended relay pylons as Prismwell couriers converge on relays.

changeFeed.reason: Echo Ledger Conclave engaged Spectrum Bloom Flux Array.

transcript.speaker: gm
transcript.text: Tempered Accord Custodial Council seized the Auric Steppe Corridor from the Prismwell Kite Guild amid a sudden tactical surge.

transcript.speaker: gm
transcript.text: Prismwell Kite Guild lost their hold on the Auric Steppe, retreating toward the Sable Crescent Basin.

transcript.speaker: gm
transcript.text: Echo Ledger Conclave activates the Spectrum Bloom Flux Array, a critical prohibited capability that threatens the Kyther Range.

transcript.speaker: gm
transcript.text: Sable Crescent Basin is under serious threat while the Custodial Council stabilised the Kyther Range Vault.
